Video resource, accessed by video ID or video reference ID

Path

$BASE_URL/accounts/1234/videos/5678

$BASE_URL/accounts/1234/videos/5678,9123 (multi-video get and delete; limit of 10)

$BASE_URL/accounts/1234/videos/ref:myRefId

Also, GET a list of manual playlists associated with a video (see below) $BASE_URL/accounts/1234/videos/5678/references

Usage

GET

Returns video data for the ID specified.

OAuth operator required: "video-cloud/video/read"

Fields

Field Type Description
account_id String
complete Boolean
created_at Number, milliseconds from epoch
cue_points Array of Maps
   cue_points.0.id String
   cue_points.0.force_stop Boolean
   cue_points.0.metadata String; code point only
   cue_points.0.name String
   cue_points.0.time Float
   cue_points.0.type String
custom_fields Map of field-value pairs (Strings)
dash manifest_id String
description String; takes the place of the old shortDescription
digital_master_id String
duration Number, milliseconds
economics String, must be one of valid enum values
folder_id String Mongo-type ID of folder to which video belongs
geo Map of property-value pairs
   geo.countries Array of country code Strings
   geo.exclude_countries Boolean
   geo.restricted Boolean
id String
images Map of property-value pairs
   images.thumbnail Map
     images.thumbnail.asset_id String
     images.thumbnail.src String URL
     images.thumbnail.sources Array of Maps
       images.thumbnail.sources.asset_id String
       images.thumbnail.sources.src String URL
       images.thumbnail.sources.height Number
       images.thumbnail.sources.width Number
   images.poster Map
     images.poster.asset_id String
     images.poster.src String URL
     images.poster.sources Array of Maps
       images.poster.sources.asset_id String
       images.poster.sources.src String URL
       images.poster.sources.height Number
       images.poster.sources.width Number
link Map of property-value pairs
   link.url String
   link.text String
long_description String
name String
original_filename String will be null for remote asset videos
reference_id String
schedule Map of property-value pairs
   schedule.ends_at String in ISO-8601 date format
   schedule.starts_at String in ISO-8601 date format
sharing Map of property-value pairs
   sharing.by_external_acct Boolean
   sharing.by_id String pub ID that originated the share
   sharing.source_id String video ID of the original video (sharer's copy)
   sharing.to_external_acct Boolean
   sharing.by_reference Boolean
smooth_client_manifest_id String
smooth_server_manifest_id String
state String ACTIVE, INACTIVE, PENDING, DELETED
tags Array of tags (Strings)
text_tracks Array of HTML5-style text tracks
   id String read-only
   src String address of the track file (URL)
   srclang String language of the track, e.g. "en"
   label String a user-readable title
   kind String how the track is meant to be used: "subtitles", "captions", "descriptions", "chapters", "metadata"
   mime_type String mime type of the track file, e.g. "text/vtt"
   asset_id String read-only; null if asset is remote
   sources Array read-only
     src String address of the track file (URL)
   default Boolean indicates that the track should be enabled by default. Should only be true on one track.
updated_at Number, milliseconds from epoch

When asking for more than one video, results are presented as an array of video objects. If one or more of the videos you request is invalid, the request will not fail; the response will contain the valid videos.

Options

none

POST

not supported

PATCH

OAuth operator required: "video-cloud/video/update"

Fields

Field Type Notes
complete Boolean
cue_points Array of Maps you must patch the entire array to update
   cue_points.0.name String required
   cue_points.0.type String required; must be one of valid enum values
   cue_points.0.time Float required; in seconds
   cue_points.0.metadata String; code point only
   cue_points.0.force_stop Boolean
custom_fields Map of field-value pairs (Strings) patch to null to unset
description String
economics String must be one of valid enum values
geo Map of property-value pairs to unset, you can either patch 'geo: null' or 'geo{}'
   geo.countries Array of country code Strings
   geo.exclude_countries Boolean
   geo.restricted Boolean
link Map of property-value pairs
   link.url String
   link.text String
long_description String
name String; cannot be empty or null
reference_id String must be unique in the account
schedule Map of property-value pairs
   schedule.ends_at String in ISO-8601 date format
   schedule.starts_at String in ISO-8601 date format
state String must be one of valid enum values
tags Array of tags (Strings) Strings cannot be empty or contain commas
text_tracks Array of HTML5-style text tracks - follow link for more information on editing this array
   src String address of the track file (URL)
   srclang String language of the track, e.g. "en"
   label String a user-readable title
   kind String how the track is meant to be used: "subtitles", "captions", "descriptions", "chapters", "metadata"
   mime_type String mime type of the track file, e.g. "text/vtt"
   default Boolean indicates that the track should be enabled by default. Should only be true on one track.

DELETE

Deletes video from the account; will fail with a descriptive error if the video is in a manual playlist. If you attempt to delete multiple videos, invalid videos in the list will be ignored and the valid ones will be deleted successfully. Only 10 videos can be deleted per call.

OAuth operator required: "video-cloud/video/delete"

Video References

Path

$BASE_URL/accounts/1234/videos/5678/references

Usage

GET

Returns manual playlist IDs that reference the video ID specified.

OAuth operator required: "video-cloud/video/read"

Fields

Field Type Description
playlists Array List of manual playlist IDs that have this video as a member

DELETE

Removes the video from all of the manual playlists of which it is a member. This is a convenience method to remove references before deleting the video - it should not be used to remove a video from a single playlist. To do that, edit the individual playlist's video_ids property, as described in playlist.md.

OAuth operator required: "video-cloud/video/delete"
